verses.text: Mamin Jehová, Yajal ach t'a satcha’anh, tzin q'ue q'uelan t'ayach ayic ay tas snib'ej in k'ool.
Mamin, a t'ayach tzonh och q'uelan, icha val yoch q'uelan winh checab' t'a spatrón, ma icha val yoch q'uelan ix criada t'a ix spatrona. Ach co Diosal, van co maclan yok' a k'ool t'ayonh.
Mamin Jehová, ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayonh. Ok'ocab' a k'ool t'ayonh, yujto maxtzac techajlaj cuuj b'aj tzonh paticajcaneli.
Tzonh tzactzaj yuj sb'uchval eb' b'eyum yet' b'aj tzonh spatiquejel eb' ak'umtac syutej sb'a.
